alert.note: Alert for Grant (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 8:16PM CDT until June 20 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WADENA...SOUTHEASTERN OTTER TAIL AND NORTHEASTERN GRANT COUNTIES... At 816 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Deer Creek, or 34 miles southeast of Detroit Lakes, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wadena, Ottertail Lake, New York Mills, Elbow Lake, Parkers Prairie, Battle Lake and Henning. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 66 and 80. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
